website_summaries.verdict: Microsoft’s Surface Pro line is an incredible value for anyone who prizes portability without compromising on speed and usability.
pros: Surface Pro computers are light and powerful
you truly get a full laptop experience, despite it being tablet-sized
cons: The 12.3-inch screen may mean a little bit of squinting when it comes to editing photos and videos

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. It seems to work fine. The problem that I have is the picture on the website is misleading. This tablet does NOT come with the cover/keyboard, although the picture on the website shows that it does. Other than that it is too soon to see if it is worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: DanF

customer_reviews.title: I love my Surface Pro 4
customer_reviews.text: I love my Surface Pro 4, it is exactly what I was looking for. It's light which is wonderful since I am carrying it with me often to edit photographs and draw. The Battery life is great for what I need it for. I was able to watch a 2 hour movie and the battery only went down to 80%. It's extremely fast and works great while I am editing photos with Lightroom and Photoshop. The screen resolution is just amazing. I even tested out a couple of games on it and they worked well (Skyrim and Sims 4). I don't think I have any complaints and it was well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Pruett

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable to use for hand position on the additional keyboard ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a unique technology and is taking some time to figure out how to operate all of the features, especially with no mouse. I have had some challenges trying to find the solutions to some online, such as, click and drag. It is comfortable to use for hand position on the additional keyboard I purchased with it. I think the keyboard is a must. The screen quality is excellent and I like the overall size, not too big or small. I have been using for about 1 week to date, so beginners remarks.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this much functinalality and portability.
customer_reviews.text: Working great for the drawing as well as standard computer needs. Nice and light, working great with the stylus, hard to beat the price to performance for an older system. I know the battery isn't as good as the new versions of the surface systems but for its age and being an i7 I really can't complain much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Replace my laptop completely. Able to do my CAD work and other designs on it. Heck even play games with no latency (after adjusting display settings). Gets a little warm and fan kicks in alot, but when running high graphic design work or games even my PC does that. Havent encountered software that it cant handle yet!
customer_reviews.author: Artchas

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and nice design
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and nice design, and performance is also good. Sometimes when it is switch to tablet mode the touch response is not so good in web browser. Happened twice in the first month that the device can't be restarted after update of the operation system, I have to reset and initialize the device.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product But What Was Microsoft Thinking by Not Installing Media Player?
customer_reviews.text: There are no words to describe how much I love this product. Transitioned seamlessly from my older laptop PCs - don't like to use them anymore! Powerhouse product! Only problem is Microsoft does not include media player with this product - go figure? Still working on trying to find media player software that works on it. Other than this - perfect product!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it, use it for school
customer_reviews.text: First off, the surface came to me and would not hold a charge, not sure is this due to the seller or if it was a defective product. Microsoft store switched it out with a new one. Love it, use it for school, work, and a little gaming/drawing/movies etc. I was an iPad person, but, due to needing more capabilities (CAC access, USB ports, MS Office and school applications) I was forced to change. I do not regret it. I still use iTunes, it's about the same size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic computer. Runs extremely well. One problem: Sometimes the pen will write when you're close to the screen but not touching it. Solution: Take the battery out and put it back in. Note for first time use: When I first got the computer I didn't want to dirty up the unprotected screen, so I turned it on and used the pen. While first setting up you can't use the pen until you set it up... so save yourself some time and use your fingers (if you don't have the keypad).
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B.

customer_reviews.title: it is a great computing device
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is atrocious (1:30 min) even following all of MSFT's suggestions, unloading things from startup, operating only in battery saver mode, etc. Screen is fabulous. Viewing videos often cause the OS to hang up. If you plan to use it a slightly mobile desktop, it is a great computing device. If like me you intend to use it in a mobile capacity, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze N. Saddles

customer_reviews.title: The Surface Pro 4 after working more than 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: The Surface Pro 4 after working more than 30 minutes, the screen starts to vibrate, then it begins to turn off the screen every second (flashes) We try to place a support case in Microsoft and it indicates that it is out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good with the potential to be great.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice all around unit. It's my tablet, laptop and mobile desktop (home and office). I had an iPad and I have to say that the user interface on the iPad is far superior to this, but the iPad cannot do the PC work I need to do. It's a good all-in-one unit. Maybe a few software updates away from being great.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: So before you buy, please note this item does not include the keyboard. For some reason, the speaker makes a strange buzzing noise. It was not advertized as refurbished, it was listed as new. All in all, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Moore

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎👎😜😜😜
customer_reviews.text: One usb port, will torture you, the keyboard rebates, and memory small.... it is necessary to buy any devices....

customer_reviews.title: I love my pro4
customer_reviews.text: I love my pro4. Compare with pro 3, this one is much slimmer. And I used it almost a week. No overheat problem. Glad I checked other review, and didn't spend few hundred bucks to buy anniversary one. The regular one is enough for me to use.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tablet that could do anything a laptop could do, and I got it! Plenty of space and memory, great graphics, very fast, and it's not too heavy. A little pricey, but I think the extra money will end up being well worth it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Surface pro 4! Works just as good as my Desktop PC!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nice

customer_reviews.title: Good product, credible seller
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived as expected, in good conditions and is fully functional, but the Surface Pen didn't work, even after I changed the battery. (This was a pre-owned item). The tablet is very fast and hosts incredible power in such a tiny format. Mostly happy with that product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of warranty and part may be broken
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. Everything may seem to work but seller got me a surface pro 4 with a broken keyboard port and It can't even be fixed due to it also being out of warranty. I have to use a bluetooth keyboard for upmost functionality as a 2 in 1
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it very easy to carry fromy place to place on location. But powerful enough for my office work

customer_reviews.title: Surface Pro4 Dead after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sadden to now report that after just four months my Surface Pro4 no longer turns on. I had this problem once before and thought I knew how to get it going again. But now...it's dead and $1700 down the drain because the return window is closed. I should have listened to the negative reviews instead of all the positive.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine - had trouble getting the pen paired initially
customer_reviews.text: I love how my Surface Pro 4 works, but had a lot of trouble getting the pen to pair. It took several days and help from Microsoft tech support to figure it out. I'm still not sure what the issue was. It may have been a bad battery in the original pen. I replaced it, but it was still another day before the pen suddenly started working. I can't wait to start using it. I'm an older customer, so having a printed user manual would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for a laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to go if you have a laptop and want something smaller and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Randy B

customer_reviews.title: The battery needs to be better.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is very short. I am taking an online college class & after about 3 hours I must plug in the power cord. The speed & quality of the surface is wonderful. The pin is a real plus when moving from one program to another.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Raney

customer_reviews.title: Surface pro 4 16gb ram review
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It was everything I needed in a laptop. It runs very fast while having word documents, internet browsers, and other apps running! Very efficient and would recommend for anyone searching for a laptop/tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Eason

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet PC
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was flawless, I love this tablet PC. Its light, works like a charm (received an update within days of purchasing which sorted the "would not wake up issue"). I purchased the Microsoft Keyboard with fingerprint reader as well - amazing, comfortable keyboard and that works everytime, and works like a charm - abosolutely love this, what more can I say. I fly and travel by train a lot and its perfect for on the move. Why would one ever want a laptop again - this is the future for now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, works great
customer_reviews.text: The system arrived on time and in great condition. I had no problem getting started using it and haven't run into any functionality issues so far. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Surface Pro 4
customer_reviews.text: Everything as promised. I like it more each day as I figure out how to use it better.

customer_reviews.text: I have had the surface just over a year and it has worked fine. Unfortunately, over the last month, the screen has come unglued on the left side. I have to keep sticking it back down and the screen has a yellowing discoloration on that side. Very disappointed.

Battery last between 4 to 5.5 hours in "battery saver" mode and " bigness in "suggested" mode. I relay like this machine it has all I need, Mobility & Performance!

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Would be another one for my husband

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up

customer_reviews.title: Adobe Photoshop & Lightroom Fly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in excellent condition. Coming from traditional desktops and laptops, taking some getting used to operating. Purchased configured with i7 and 16Gb of RAM to replace a six core desktop for portability and to run PhotoShop and Lightroom. This machine is fast and no hiccups with large raw files in Photoshop. Going from a 22" monitor to the Surface Pro's screen is an adjustment, as is using the pen instead of a mouse.

It is a tablet and tablet only this is NOT a laptop replacement. also windows 10.... however they took the return with grace and refunded me, so all is good.

customer_reviews.title: The i7 version is worth the price...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device. I needed a Windows tablet and plenty of power as I run VM's, Netbeans, Visual Studio, etc and run some additional programming softwares/IDE's and occasionally do some video editing. This SP4 w/ i7 blazes through pretty much everything. Not too worried about throttling as I didn't purchase this device for gaming, that's what my desktop rig is for. UPDATE: By doing various power setting hacks (included in links i posted), I am able to get 9+ hours battery life. No issues at all.

product_meta.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 4 (512 GB, 16 GB RAM, Intel Core i7e)
product_meta.description: Microsoft Surface Pro 4 is the tablet that can replace your laptop. Featuring a 6th Gen Intel Core i7e processor with 16GB memory and a 512GB solid state drive, it is more powerful than its predecessor yet lighter than ever before at 1.73 pounds. The amazing 12.3" touchscreen PixelSense display with 2736 x 1824 resolution has extremely high contrast and low glare. Use the included Surface Pen to mark-up presentations, sign documents, take notes and much more. Performance and versatility for professionals, creatives, and more.
feature_bullets: Surface Pro 4 powers through everything you need to do, while being lighter than ever before
The 12.3” PixelSense screen has extremely high contrast and low glare so you can work through the day without straining your eyes
Go from tablet to laptop in a snap with the multi-position Kickstand and improved keyboard.
